name: Coinport
description:
This game is made for the VimJam. You can collect coins which teleport you there and back but sometimes they won't teleport you back.

You play as a little girl named Lea. You are trapped in a tower and need to find a way out. But is this real? Or is this a dream?

I would love to hear your opinion about this game. Do you like the idea? What would you add or change? Do you want me to make more levels and add more features? Because thats my plan. Let me know your opinion so maybe your idea will find its way into the game.
